content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **note ** this same pattern appears again on the pierrot website with a different name and pattern photo it is called 27-543v 2 on the pattern website and さらっとコットンのベスト *saratto kotton no besuto* in the pattern pdf the patterns are **identical** however 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/28-14/ 2 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/27-543v/
